name: Over The Years
description:
A visual novel telling the story of two kids and a bakery over the course of 19 years. You are the bakery owner, and as you watch these two grow up, you will have to solve conflicts and play minigames. Try to reach the good ending!

A group of friends wanted to try to make a game for the Cozy Autumn game jam and this was the result! All first time joining a game jam and developing a game in general! Hope you enjoy the story!

Developers: ScarletFangs (SK), AMQ4LIFEILOVEAMQ (SV)

Story: Bronpro (BW), Carl Grini

Lead Artist: Caitlin Lee

Project Lead/Architect: Nanofu (SN)
